module.name: cbs_conversions

element.name: TrimList
element.short: Concatenates a TStrings list into a single, space-separated string or replaces all line endings in a string with a single space.

dl.dd: A TStrings object containing the list of strings or an input string.

descr.p: Returns a single string with all list items joined by spaces or the string with all line endings replaced by spaces

element.name: TextToBool
element.short: Converts a string value to a boolean, based on specified string representations for True and False.

descr.p: Returns True if aValue matches aTrue, otherwise False.

element.name: BoolToText
element.short: Converts a boolean value to a string, based on specified string representations for True and False.

dl.dd: The string to return for True.
The string to return for False.

descr.p: Returns the corresponding aTrue or aFalse string.

element.name: WildcardWords
element.short: Format string to query each part in diferent words

descr.p: Processes a string of words to add a wildcard character (% by default) between them. It handles quoted strings and ignores hashtags (words starting with #).

dl.dd: The input string containing words to be wildcarded.
The wildcard character to insert. Defaults to %.

descr.p: Returns a new string with the wildcard character between each word.

element.name: WildcardSyllables
element.short: Format string to query each part in the same word

descr.p: Similar to WildcardWords, this function adds a wildcard character (% by default) to a string, but it treats spaces and + symbols as delimiters. It also ignores hashtags.

dl.dd: The input string containing syllables or parts of words.
The wildcard character to insert. Defaults to %.

descr.p: Returns a new string with the wildcard character inserted based on syllable delimiters.

element.name: DartISO8601ToPascal
element.short: Convert the ISO8601 date and time format from Dart to Pascal

element.name: TextToDate
element.short: Convert a string to date or return the null date

descr.p: It uses TryStrToDate for safe conversion. If the conversion fails, it returns the NullDate.

dl.dd: The string to convert to a date.

descr.p: Returns the converted TDate or NullDate.

element.name: TextToTime
element.short: Convert a string to time or return the null time

descr.p: It uses TryStrToTime for safe conversion. If the conversion fails, it returns the NullTime.

dl.dd: The string to convert to a time.

descr.p: Returns the converted TTime or NullTime.

element.name: StrToIntOrZero
element.short: Safely converts a string to an Integer. If the conversion fails, it returns 0.

element.name: StrToFloatOrZero
element.short: Safely converts a string to a Double. If the conversion fails, it returns 0.0.

element.name: RemoveDiacritics
element.short: Removes diacritical marks (accents, cedilla, etc.) from a string by replacing accented characters with their unaccented counterparts.

descr.p: Returns the string with all diacritics removed.

element.name: DartISO8601ToDate
element.short: Converts ISO 8601 timestamp in Dart language format to Pascal's TDateTime

descr.p: Dart language timestamp uses ISO 8601 with milliseconds (2025-08-01T23:03:45.457879), which cause an error in ISO8601ToDate. It handles parsing by truncating the fractional seconds part.

dl.dd: The ISO 8601 string in Dart format.

descr.p: Returns the converted TDateTime or NullDateTime.

module.short: Provides a set of functions for data conversion and manipulation
